data.trans_hint: Vấn đề về tài chính của chúng tôi đang được cải thiện.
data.en_hint: Our financial situation finally seems to be looking up.
data.content_game_1: Our financial situation finally seems to be looking up.
data.answer_en_hint: Our financial situation finally seems to be looking up.

data.trans_hint: Máy ảnh của tôi lại dừng hoạt động nữa rồi.
data.en_hint: My camera has packed up again.
data.content_game_1: My camera has packed up again.
data.answer_en_hint: My camera has packed up again.

data.trans_hint: Bạn tôi luôn luôn đến muộn 30 phút.
data.en_hint: My friend always rolls up 30 minutes late.
data.content_game_1: My friend always rolls up 30 minutes late.
data.answer_en_hint: My friend always rolls up 30 minutes late.

data.trans_hint: Tôi tình cờ gặp cô ấy lúc sáng nay ở trên đường.
data.en_hint: I ran into her this morning on the street.
data.content_game_1: I ran into her this morning on the street.
data.answer_en_hint: I ran into her this morning on the street.

data.trans_hint: Hãy quanh quẩn gần đây, chúng tôi sẽ cần sự giúp đỡ của bạn sau.
data.en_hint: Stick around, we'll need your help later.
data.content_game_1: stick around, we'll need your help later.
data.answer_en_hint: stick around, we'll need your help later.

data.trans_hint: Tất cả mọi người đang làm việc chăm chỉ cho dự án này và sự chăm chỉ đó đã được đền đáp.
data.en_hint: Everyone has been beavering away at this project, and hard work paid off.
data.content_game_1: Everyone has been beavering away at this project, and hard work paid off.
data.answer_en_hint: Everyone has been beavering away at this project, and hard work paid off.

data.trans: Hẹn gặp ai đó (đặc biệt khi mình đến thăm chỗ mà đang ở)
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy hứa gặp tôi khi cô ấy vào thành phố, nhưng chẳng bao giờ cô ta thực hiện lời hứa cả.
data.en_hint: She promised to look me up whenever she was in town, but she never did.
data.content_game_1: She promised to look me up whenever she was in town, but she never did.
data.answer_en_hint: She promised to look me up whenever she was in town, but she never did.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang rất mệt mỏi vì bị đối xử tệ bạc - Tôi không cần một thứ tình bạn như thế.
data.en_hint: I am tired of being mucking about - I don't need a friendship as such.
data.content_game_1: I am tired of being mucking about - I don't need a friendship as such.
data.answer_en_hint: I am tired of being mucking about - I don't need a friendship as such.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đang phải chịu nhiều áp lực trong công việc đến mức đôi lần cô ấy định thôi việc và quay trở về quê.
data.en_hint: She is under so much pressure at work that sometimes she even considers packing her job in and going back to her hometown.
data.content_game_1: She is under so much pressure at work that sometimes she even considers packing her job in and going back to her hometown.
data.answer_en_hint: She is under so much pressure at work that sometimes she even considers packing her job in and going back to her hometown.

data.trans_hint: Jack thực sự vô tâm khi anh ta chỉ trích Mary trước mặt mọi người trong cuộc họp.
data.en_hint: Jack was really insensible when he pulled Mary up in front of everyone in the meeting.
data.content_game_1: Jack was really insensible when he pulled Mary up in front of everyone in the meeting.
data.answer_en_hint: Jack was really insensible when he pulled Mary up in front of everyone in the meeting.

data.trans: Làm ai đó cảm thấy xấu hổ
data.trans_hint: Anh ta cố gắng làm tôi xấu hổ trong cuộc họp, nhưng may mắn thay tất cả đồng nghiệp của tôi đã ủng hộ tôi.
data.en_hint: He tried to show me up in the meeting, but luckily all of my colleagues had my back.
data.content_game_1: He tried to show me up in the meeting, but luckily all of my colleagues had my back.
data.answer_en_hint: He tried to show me up in the meeting, but luckily all of my colleagues had my back.

data.trans: Đột nhiên rời đi (trong vội vã)
data.trans_hint: Tôi phải rời đi ngay bây giờ, nhưng hãy gặp tôi khi bạn ở thành phố trong lần tới nhé.
data.en_hint: I have to take off now, but please look me up when you are in town next time.
data.content_game_1: I have to take off now, but please look me up when you are in town next time.
data.answer_en_hint: I have to take off now, but please look me up when you are in town next time.
